title: The impact of neuroscience education therapy, behavioral economics, and digital navigators on patient migraine treatment adherence to a mobile health application: a …

abstract: Mobile health (mHealth) tools can be used to deliver nonpharmacologic therapies to patients with migraine. However, mHealth studies often report poor treatment adherence. Neuroscience Education Therapy (NET), behavioral economics, and …
